title: Karen Petrone, “The Great War in Russian Memory” (Indiana UP, 2012)
description:
Historical studies on the European memory of World War I are, to put it mildly, voluminous. There are too many monographs to count on a myriad of subjects addressing the acts of remembrance and commemoration of the so-called war to end all wars. But when it comes to Russia, from...
